fields.name: txtTaxpayerName
fields.title: This Field is Automatically Calculated for You

fields.name: txtTaxPayerSSN
fields.title: This Field is Automatically Calculated for You

options.label: Line 1a - Discharge of indebtedness in a title 11 case
Line 1b - Discharge of indebtedness to the extent insolvent (not in a title 11 case)
Lie 1c - Discharge of qualified farm indebtedness
Line 1d - Discharge of qualified real property business indebtedness
Line 1e - Discharge of qualified principal residence indebtedness (Caution: See instructions before checking this box if debt was discharged after 2017. )

fields.name: txtTotAmtIndebted
fields.title: Line 2 - Total amount of discharged indebtedness excluded from gross income

fields.name: txtDiscQualRealProp
fields.title: Line 4 - For a discharge of qualified real property business indebtedness applied to reduce the basis of depreciable real property

fields.name: txtAmntUnderSectB108
fields.title: Line 5 - That you elect under section 108(b)(5) to apply first to reduce the basis (under section 1017) of depreciable property

fields.name: txtNetOperatingLoss
fields.title: Line 6 - Applied to reduce any net operating loss that occurred in the tax year of the discharge or carried over to the tax year of the discharge

fields.name: txtGeneralBussCredit
fields.title: Line 7 - Applied to reduce any general business credit carryover to or from the tax year of the discharge

fields.name: txtMinimumTaxCredit
fields.title: Line 8 - Applied to reduce any minimum tax credit as of the beginning of the tax year immediately after the tax year of the discharge

fields.name: txtNetCapitalLoss
fields.title: Line 9 - Applied to reduce any net capital loss for the tax year of the discharge, including any capital loss carryovers to the tax year of the discharge

fields.name: txtReduceBasis
fields.title: Line 10a - Applied to reduce the basis of nondepreciable and depreciable property if not reduced on line 5. DO NOT use in the case of discharge of qualified farm indebtedness

fields.name: txtF982ResPrincAmt
fields.title: Line 10b - Applied to reduce the basis of your principal residence. Enter amount here ONLY if line 1e is checked

fields.name: txtDeprPropertyUsedHeld
fields.title: Line 11a - For a discharge of qualified farm indebtedness applied to reduce the basis of: Depreciable property used or held for use in a trade or business or for the production of income if not reduced on line 5

fields.name: txtLandUsedHeld
fields.title: Line 11b - For a discharge of qualified farm indebtedness applied to reduce the basis of: Land used or held for use in a trade or business of farming

fields.name: txtOtherPropUsedHeld
fields.title: Line 11c - For a discharge of qualified farm indebtedness applied to reduce the basis of: Other property used or held for use in a trade or business or for the production of income

fields.name: txtPassActivityLoss
fields.title: Line 12 - Applied to reduce any passive activity loss and credit carryovers from the tax year of the discharge

fields.name: txtForeginTaxcdtCarryover
fields.title: Line 13 - Applied to reduce any foreign tax credit carryover to or from the tax year of the discharge

fields.name: txtAmtExcluSect1081B
fields.title: Part III - Consent of Corporation to Adjustment of Basis of Its Property Under Section 1082(a)(2). Amount he corporation named above has excluded from its gross income Under section 1081(b)

fields.name: txtTaxYearBegin
fields.title: Tax Year Beginning(MM/DD/YYYY)

fields.name: txtTaxYearEnd
fields.title: Tax Year Ending(MM/DD/YYYY)

fields.name: cboStateOfInc
fields.title: Select the State The corporation is organized in
